page.title: 03A DAY IN THE LIFE OF PENNY
page.content: In the morning I usually get up at about 7 o'clock. I go down for breakfast and have hot milk and bran flakes and sometimes coffee. I go upstairs to get dressed. Often I can't open the drawer. I go to school _ my mum takes me. I have about half an hours play. At 9 o'clock we go in for assembly,after that we do maths and reading.At playtime we play yellow lines.Someone is "on" and you have to keep to the lines.Before lunch we often do writing. In the afternoon we sometimes do art and craft.At half past three we go home and I watch all the childrens programmes on television till 6 o'clock. I have my tea then I watch "Wogan". I go in the bath and at 8 o'clock I go to bed.
